SEARCH
Package de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager.expressionengine

Klasse Parser.Expression

java.lang.Object
de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager.expressionengine.Parser.Expression
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
Parser.Expression.Assignment, Parser.Expression.Binary, Parser.Expression.Call, Parser.Expression.ConditionalBranch, Parser.Expression.ConditionalChain, Parser.Expression.Grouping, Parser.Expression.Literal, Parser.Expression.Logical, Parser.Expression.Sequence, Parser.Expression.Ternary, Parser.Expression.Unary, Parser.Expression.Variable
Umschließende Klasse:
Parser
public abstract static class Parser.Expression extends Object

Abstract base class for all expression nodes in the abstract syntax tree. Each expression represents a syntactic construct that can be evaluated to produce a value during execution.

This class implements the Visitor pattern to allow different operations to be performed on expression trees without modifying the expression classes themselves. Each concrete expression type implements the accept method to dispatch to the appropriate visitor method.


 Expression expr = new Binary(
     new Literal(10),
     new Token(TokenType.PLUS, "+", null, 1),
     new Literal(5)
 );
 Integer result = expr.accept(new EvaluationVisitor());

    Parser.Expression.Assignment

    Represents a binary operation expression with a left operand, operator, and right operand.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Call
    Represents a function call expression with a function name and zero or more arguments.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.ConditionalBranch
    Represents a single branch within a conditional chain, containing a condition and the expression to evaluate if that condition is true.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.ConditionalChain
    Represents a complete conditional chain with multiple if/elif branches and an optional else clause.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Grouping
    Represents a grouped expression enclosed in parentheses that controls evaluation order.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Literal
    Represents a literal value expression that contains a constant value such as numbers, strings, booleans, or null.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Logical
    Represents a logical expression that combines two expressions with a logical operator.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Sequence
    Represents a sequence of expressions that are evaluated in order, with the final expression's value being the result of the sequence.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Ternary
    Represents a ternary conditional expression (condition ?
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Unary
    Represents a unary operation expression that applies an operator to a single operand.
    static class 
    Parser.Expression.Variable
    Represents a variable reference expression that looks up a value by name in the current execution context.
